content: get ready to crochet the adorable bat squish with this easy-to-follow pattern perfect for halloween or any time you want a cute and cuddly companion this pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial for help with the tricky bits the finished bat measures approximately 10 inches across/tall excluding ears wings and feet embrace your crochet skills and bring this charming creature to life **unique features-** easy-to-follow written pattern for all skill levels video tutorial for visual learners creates a 3-dimensional bat with cute ears wings and feet **materials needed-** us-l 8 0 mm hook **susan bates** https //amzn to/4owduoh 330 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/45pzqxo 6 - super bulky 100% polyester 300g/10 5 oz 201 m/220 yds **10 microbead pillow ball** https //amzn to/3zqefkm or fiber fill **2 safety eyes - 24mm** https //amzn to/3pnlfhp **stitch markers** https //amzn to/40vufja
